CODIFIED ORDINANCES OF SPRINGBORO, OHIO

PART TWELVE - PLANNING AND ZONING CODE

TITLE TWO - Planning

CHAPTER 1229 Historic Preservation

1229.01 TITLE.

1229.02 PURPOSE.

1229.03 DEFINITIONS.

1229.04 ARCHITECTURAL REVIEW BOARD.

1229.05 DESIGNATION CRITERIA FOR LANDMARKS AND PRESERVATION DISTRICTS.

1229.06 PROCEDURE FOR ESTABLISHING FUTURE LANDMARKS AND HISTORIC PRESERVATION DISTRICTS.

1229.07 PROCEDURES FOR THE REVIEW OF PROPOSED CHANGES TO PROTECTED PROPERTIES.

1229.08 REGULATION OF MAJOR CHANGES; CERTIFICATES OF APPROPRIATENESS.

1229.085 REGULATION OF MINOR CHANGES; CERTIFICATES OF APPROPRIATENESS.

1229.09 MINIMUM MAINTENANCE REQUIREMENT.

1229.10 PENALTIES AND REMEDIES.

1229.11 SEVERABILITY.
